meaningMnemonic: To show that you had <kanji>merit</kanji> for a <kanji>chapter</kanji> of your life you will be given a <vocabulary>decoration</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>medal</vocabulary>. Especially if you're a soldier or an athlete.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
